select LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into project_member_detail (id,business_status,create_time,creator,data_status,end_date,man_hour,member_id,modifier,modify_time,name,start_date,week,year,project_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{businessStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dataStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{manHour,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{week,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{year,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update project_member_detail
business_status = #{businessStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data_status = #{dataStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
man_hour = #{manHour,jdbcType=INTEGER},
member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
week = #{week,jdbcType=INTEGER},
year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER},
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where data_status=1 and id = #{id}
